What We Treat

Adults 18+ • Florida residents only

Treatments Available (Not all inclusive. We treat many other conditions)

Eye, Ear, Nose, Mouth & Throat

  • Cold Sore
  • Dental abscess / Infection
  • Ear Infection (Swimmer's Ear)
  • Eye Infection (Pink Eye)
  • Laryngitis
  • Seasonal Allergies
  • Sinus Infection
  • Strep Throat
  • Stye
  • Thrush
  • Tonsillitis

Respiratory System

  • Asthma
  • Bronchitis
  • COPD
  • COVID-19
  • Flu
  • Pneumonia

Cardiovascular System

  • Hypertension (High Blood Pressure) (Refills only)

Digestive System

  • Abdominal pain
  • Bloating
  • Constipation
  • Diarrhea
  • Fatigue
  • Food Poisoning
  • Gastroenteritis
  • GERD (Acid Reflux)
  • Hemorrhoids
  • Irritable Bowel Syndrome
  • Lactose Intolerance
  • Nausea / Vomiting

Endocrine System

  • Addisons Disease (Refills only)
  • Diabetes (High Blood Sugar) (Refills only)
  • Hyperlipidemia (High Cholesterol) (Refills only)
  • Thyroid Dysfunction (Refills only)

Skin Conditions

  • Acne
  • Allergies
  • Animal / insect bites or scratch
  • Athlete's Foot
  • Boil
  • Cellulitis
  • Dandruff
  • Eczema
  • Genital Herpes
  • Hair Loss (Refills only)
  • Herpes
  • Ingrown Hair
  • Ingrown Nail
  • Lice
  • Nail Fungus
  • Poison Ivy
  • Psoriasis
  • Scabies
  • Shingles
  • Skin Rash
  • Tick Bites

Musculoskeletal Issues

  • Arthritis
  • Back Pain
  • Body Aches
  • Gout
  • Pulled Muscle
  • Twisted Wrist / Ankle

Mood Disorders (REFILL ONLY)

  • Anxiety (Provider discretion, refill only)
  • Depression (Refill only)

Neurological Disorders

  • Alzheimer's (Refill only)
  • Dizziness
  • Headaches
  • Migraines
  • Nerve Pain
  • Parkinson's Disease (Refill only)
  • Restless Leg Syndrome (Refill only)
  • Seizure / Epilepsy (Refill only)
  • Vertigo

Urinary System

  • Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia (BPH)
  • Urinary Tract Infection (UTI)

Reproductive System

  • Bacterial Vaginosis (BV)
  • Birth Control / Contraception (Refill only)
  • Erectile Dysfunction (Refill only)
  • Genital Herpes
  • Menopause (Refill only)
  • Period Pain / Dysmenorrhea / Menstrual Pain
  • Sexually Transmitted Infections (STI's) (Requires Complex Visit)

Prevention Care

  • Epi Pen (Refill only)
  • PrEP (Pre-Exposure Prophylaxis)

Multiple / Complex Visits (Additional Fees Apply)

Includes 2 or more conditions (refills or diagnosis) or visits requiring more than 15 minutes. Please book a Complex Visit.

STI's visits require a more comprehensive evaluation—please schedule a 30-minute appointment. (Additional charges apply.)

***This is not an all inclusive list. We treat many other conditions.

*$65/visit applies to simple visit

**All fees are subject to change. All charges are NON-REFUNDABLE once a virtual connection has been made, attempted and/or services are rendered; regardless of outcome. See terms and conditions.
